full_summary:
### Ciprofloxacin Tablets or Capsules, 500 mg

**Tender Notice**
 Date of Publication: [Nov 24, 2022]
 Tender Closing Date:[Jan 31, 2023, 14:00]

### Tender Description
The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for Ciprofloxacin tablets or capsules, 500 mg for the treatment of Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) members who may have been exposed to bacterial biological warfare agents.

**Contact Information**
* Name: Safiya Motala
* Email: safiya.motala@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: 343-549-9603

### Tender Documents
The following documents can be downloaded from the [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) website:

* Amendment 1 to the Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Amendment 2 to the RFP
* Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Document Requested - RFP

### Categorization
The procurements category falls within the following North American Industrial Classification System (NAICS) codes and corresponding detailed description:

- 448191 - Pharmaceutical and Prescription Medicinal Warehouses: This NAFS Code describes a facility that stores and manages the distribution of pharmaceuticals and prescriptions for dispensary.
